items.question: What should I do if I am unorganized?
items.answer: If you find yourself struggling to schedule your day or running late frequently, there's a lot of things that you can do. Try to always think in advance about what's going to happen and what you need to do, and consider using the night before each day to prep. You can set out your clothes in advance, for example, so that you don't have to worry about getting dressed in the morning. Another thing you can do is keep your keys by the door so that you're not scrambling to find your keys each day.

The evidence revealed that their preferences for multitasking (what academics call “polychronicity”) were actually unrelated to time management skills. How well or poorly people managed their time had nothing to do with their preferences to multitask. Thus, the extensive attention so often given to multitasking by those offering time management tricks is unlikely to yield any real success.
